title: My Victoria sponge
ingredients: ['Sponge', '4 large eggs, weighed in shell', 'weight of eggs in caster sugar', 'weight of eggs in self raising flour', 'weight of eggs in unsalted butter', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder (see footnote)', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon milk (or as required)', 'Filling', '250g strawberry or raspberry jam', '300ml double cream', '30g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract (optional)', 'icing sugar (to decorate)']
